beverages.title: Espresso
beverages.text: Brewed with high water pressure and finely ground beans

beverages.title: Ristretto
beverages.text: Short shot of a more highly concentrated espresso coffee.

beverages.title: Latte
beverages.text: Espresso combined with several ounces of steamed milk

beverages.title: Chai
beverages.text: Chai refers to the milky black tea flavored with warm spices.

menuItems.title: Chai latte
menuItems.content: Chai latte is made by mixing steamed milk with black tea that has been infused with cinnamon. The drink is then topped with foam.

menuItems.title: Coffee mocca
menuItems.content: Like a caffè latte, caffè mocha is based on espresso and hot milk but with added chocolate flavouring and cocoa powder and sugar.

menuItems.title: Double lungo
menuItems.content: Italian-style coffee – short black (a single espresso shot) with much more water

menuItems.title: Cafe con leche
menuItems.content: Spanish classic - espresso with whole milk, now in XL.

menuItems.title: Chai tiger spice
menuItems.content: A rich and creamy mixture of black tea and premium spices, including cinnamon, cardamon, and clove

menuItems.title: Coffee frappe
menuItems.content: Greek iced coffee drink made from arabica coffee, water, sugar, and milk.

menuItems.title: Strong Ristretto
menuItems.content: Extra strong italian Ristretto for early mornings.

menuItems.title: Cafe Cortado
menuItems.content: A spanish classic, freshly milled coffee with an ounce of milk

combos.title: Chocolate croissant
combos.content: Freshly baked croissant filled with melted black chocolate

combos.title: Blueberry muffin
combos.content: All times classic blueberry muffin XL

combos.title: Vanilla donut
combos.content: Artesan donut made with natural vanilla

giftset.title: Chai with spices
giftset.content: Chai refers to the milky black tea flavored with warm spices. Each recipe is different, but common spices to include are cinnamon, cardamom, ginger, cloves, star anise, nutmeg, pepper and coriander.

giftset.title: Coffee set with a mug
giftset.content: Two packs of great arabica coffee and a hand-made mug.

giftset.title: Six pack
giftset.content: Six packs of excellent coffee beans: Arabica, Robusta, Liberica, Excelsa and their exotic combinations.
